title: Connection Quiz 6

questions.text: What's my favorite love language to receive?
When I give you gifts, what matters most to me?
choices: That it's something you really wanted
That it shows I was thinking of you

questions.text: What's my favorite way you show you care?
choices: Remembering small details about my life
Making me laugh when I'm stressed
Taking care of me when I'm sick
Checking in on me throughout the day

questions.text: How do I prefer you to comfort me?
What makes me feel most secure in your love?
choices: You introducing me to important people in your life
How you talk about me to others

description: Discover the ways you support each other emotionally.
